Module org.panteleyev.fx
Package org.panteleyev.fx.grid

Class GridBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.panteleyev.fx.grid.GridBuilder
public class GridBuilder extends Object

This class implements builder that creates instances of GridPane.

Configuration is done by rows. If some node requires column or/and row span configured then gridCell(Node, int, int) must be used instead of node itself.

Additional configuration for the grid pane can be done by passing Consumer<GridBuilder> to gridPane(List, Consumer).

Example:

the following layout

n_1_1n_2_1n_3_1
n_1_2n_3_2
n_1_3n_2_3

is configured by the code like this: 

 
  var gridPane = gridPane(
      List.of(
          gridRow(n_1_1, n_2_1, n_3_1),
          gridRow(gridCell(n_1_2, 2, 1), gridCell(n_3_2, 1, 2)),
          gridRow(n_1_3, n_2_3, SKIP)
      )
  );

    • gridCell

      public static javafx.scene.Node gridCell(javafx.scene.Node node, int columnSpan, int rowSpan)
      Creates special node that configures column and row span for a grid cell containing provided node.
      Parameters:
